name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-cardcomp
title: Card Composition
shortDescription: Viva Connection Adaptive Card Extension (ACE) that shows how to dynamically include dynamic cards pragmatically.
longDescription: This sample tackles a scenario in which you want to reuse part of your Adaptive Card in multiple places or you need to divide your ACE QuickView into smaller ones for readability and maintainability. In a real world scenario your ACE can grow quite a lot making handling hundreds lines of JSON quite difficult.
